name: Doodle's Diary 2
description:
[IN DEVELOPMENT -- Prototype above!]

Doodle's Diary 2 is the updated version extending from its predecessor, featuring 2.5D tower defense gameplay as you control Doodle in defending against those that seek to destroy him! This current version features more levels, a fleshed out story featuring Dan, a school boy, and updated visuals and gameplay features!
